title: Cypress Target
description: Cypress target option for Build Facade

cypressConfig.description: The path of the Cypress configuration json file.

watch.description: Recompile and run tests when files change.

tsConfig.description: The path of the Cypress tsconfig configuration json file.

devServerTarget.description: Dev server target to run tests against.

headless.description: Whether or not the open the Cypress application to run the tests. If set to 'true', will run in headless mode

baseUrl.description: Use this to pass directly the address of your distant server address with the port running your application

browser.description: Use this to specify the browser to run tests in. The browser needs to be installed on your system.
